snippet: AARON--Arnold, 86, on March 10, 2016 in Boca Raton. Graduate of NYU (AEPi) and The Ohio State University. World-renowned expert/lecturer on history and use of gold in dental industry. Past President-JCC of Spring Valley, Chairman-Israel Bonds and UJA in Rockland County. Lover of family, friends, books, and big band music. Beloved husband of 62 years of Sydell. Devoted father of Cliff and Karen Aaron, Mindy and Andrew Feldman, and Amy Aaron. Loving grandfather of Hillary, Ryan, Corey, Lindsay, Russell, Stephanie, Reuben, Mollie, Jackie, and Tara. Adored brother of Phyllis and the late Dieter Robert and Rhoda and Vic Barth. Dedicated uncle to caring nieces and nephews. 1/3
